articles.description: JNK India's IPO subscription status shows bids for 49% of the shares offered. JNK India IPO has a price band of  ₹395 to  ₹415 per share. The IPO consists of an offer-for-sale and a fresh issue of  ₹300 crore to cover working capital requirements.
